dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4125 IH: Dairy Farm Resiliency Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Molinaro (for himself, Ms. Spanberger, Mr. Van Orden, and Ms. Slotkin) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 with respect to the dairy margin coverage program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Dairy Farm Resiliency Act.

subsection.text: Section 1405(a)(1) of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (7 U.S.C. 9055(a)(1)) is amended by striking during any one of the 2011, 2012, or 2013 calendar years and inserting in the most recent three-year history, as calculated once every five years.

paragraph.text: Section 1407(b) of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (7 U.S.C. 9057(b)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the heading, by striking 5,000,000 and inserting 6,000,000; and
in paragraph (1), by striking 5,000,000 and inserting 6,000,000.

paragraph.text: Section 1407(c) of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (7 U.S.C. 9057(c)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the heading, by striking 5,000,000 and inserting 6,000,000; and
in paragraph (1), by striking 5,000,000 and inserting 6,000,000.
